data.message:
Eminem :,) you are my god :) thanks for motivating you are like a battery for me.Whenever i become low your songs charge me up.You deserve more and you are the best rapper i loved your film 8 mile and i loved the way u dissed those rappers in 8 mile rap battle.You are so cool and your mind is like a intel cpu.I love the way u rhyme and i love the way u lie one of my favorite songs stay happy legend you are in my heart :D

Regards
Stan manav :)
